org.eeml.math.equation

Class LinearEquationTwo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eeml.math.equation.LinearEquationTwo

  • public class LinearEquationTwo
extends java.lang.Object
    This class mainly implements linear equation with two unknown. It provides methods like getSolution. Maintained by EEML. see more on eeml.github.io
    Since:
    v1.0.0
    Author:
    EULIR
    See Also:
    org.eeml.math;

    • Constructor Detail

      • LinearEquationTwo

        public LinearEquationTwo()
        default constructor

      • LinearEquationTwo

        public LinearEquationTwo(double a1,
                         double b1,
                         double c1,
                         double a2,
                         double b2,
                         double c2)
        Parameters:
        a1 - coefficient of x in the first equation
        b1 - coefficient of y in the first equation
        c1 - constant coefficient in the first equation
        a2 - coefficient of x in the second equation
        b2 - coefficient of y in the second equation
        c2 - constant coefficient in the first equation
        Throws:
        HighestCoefficientBeZeroException - when a1, b1, a2 or b2 is zero
        NotSolvableException - when two equations are the same(including the situation that they have some coefficient before the parameters).
